ValidationRule.description: Peggy in CE requested an additional status field to track what was offered during an at-risk client reach out case. This rule makes sure the field is used.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = "At Risk Client" && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Resolved") && ISCHANGED(Status) && ISBLANK(TEXT(Closed_Status__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a value in the Closed Status field before resolving an At-Risk case.
